name: Rushroom (stillveganbtw)
description:
Collect mushrooms before night comes to earn points, beware of poisonous lookalikes! The index will tell you which ones are safe. Use the button mushroom in the bottom right to skip turns and the button on the top right to change music while playing.  Controls are mouse only. This is a work in progress.

Changes, 8/3:

Colorblind mode

Tutorial

Color shifting to indicate safe/poison mushrooms

Sound effects
